errors.noMatch: error: this is not a telegram bot token...
errors.failedCreateBot: failed to connect to the bot...

noBusiness.message: business mode is not enabled for this bot. instructions on how to enable it can be found at the link below.

errors.tooManyBots: you have too many bots. please remove the unnecessary ones.
errors.botExists: this bot has already been registered!

start.message: hi, {{.Name}}! here's the instruction on how to connect your own bot: • go to the @botfather bot and send the command /newbot • come up with and send any name for the bot (this name will be displayed in the header) • enter a unique username for the bot that ends with "bot" • copy the bot token (it looks something like this: 23774725:AAHZa...) and send it here • type /mybots, select your bot, go to bot settings and enable business mode

onNew.message: you can read our article on how to connect the bot (telegram premium users only)

handleToken: the bot @{{.Username}} has been successfully connected to our system.
